comment:
*

* A data kind representing an event. *

*

* You can use all columns defined for {@link ContactsContract.Data} as * well as the following aliases. *

*

Column aliases

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
TypeAliasData column
String{@link #START_DATE}{@link #DATA1}
int{@link #TYPE}{@link #DATA2}Allowed values are: *

*

    *
  • {@link #TYPE_CUSTOM}. Put the actual type in {@link #LABEL}.
    • *
  • {@link #TYPE_ANNIVERSARY}
    • *
  • {@link #TYPE_OTHER}
    • *
  • {@link #TYPE_BIRTHDAY}
    • *
*

*
String{@link #LABEL}{@link #DATA3}

variables.name: CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE
variables.comment: MIME type used when storing this in data table.

variables.name: START_DATE
variables.comment:
* The event start date as the user entered it. *

Type: TEXT

methods.name: public static int getTypeResource(Integer type)
methods.comment:
* Return the string resource that best describes the given
             * {@link #TYPE}. Will always return a valid resource.

methods.name: public static final CharSequence getTypeLabel(Resources res, int type, @Nullable CharSequence label)
methods.comment:
* Return a {@link CharSequence} that best describes the given type,
             * possibly substituting the given {@link #LABEL} value
             * for {@link #TYPE_CUSTOM}.

methodNames: public static final CharSequence getTypeLabel(Resources res, int type, @Nullable CharSequence label)
